00046 #include <qvaluevector.h>
00047 
00048 class QicsPositionList
00049 {
00050 public:
00051     typedef const int *iterator;
00052 
00053     QicsPositionList()  { setFirstIndex(0); init(); }
00054     QicsPositionList(int base)  { setFirstIndex(base); init(); }
00055     
00056     inline int firstIndex(void) const  { return myBase; }
00057     inline void setFirstIndex(int base)  { myBase = base; }
00058 
00059     inline int lastIndex(void) const { return myBase + size() - 1; }
00060 
00061     inline void push_back(const int &val)
00062     { myPositions.push_back(val); }
00063 
00064     inline int at(int idx) const
00065     { return (myPositions.at(idx - myBase)); }
00066 
00067     inline int operator[](int idx) const { return at(idx); }
00068 
00069     inline void clear(void) { myPositions.clear(); }
00070 
00071     inline int size(void) const { return myPositions.size(); }
00072 
00073     inline iterator begin(void) const { return myPositions.begin(); }
00074     inline iterator end(void) const { return myPositions.end(); }
00075     
00076 protected:
00077     void init(void) { myPositions.reserve(50); }
00078     QValueVector<int> myPositions;
00079     int myBase; 
00080 };

00107 class QicsGrid: public Qics {
00108 
00109 public:
00115     QicsGrid(QicsGridInfo &info);
00119     virtual ~QicsGrid();
00120 
00124     inline QicsGridInfo &gridInfo(void) const { return myInfo; }
00125 
00131     virtual void setViewport(const QicsRegion &reg);
00132 
00138     virtual QicsRegion viewport(void) const;
00139 
00146     bool isCellValid(int row, int col) const;
00147 
00155     QRect cellDimensions(int row, int col, bool with_spans) const;
00156 
00161     QRect cellDimensions(const QicsICell &cell, bool with_spans) const
00162     { return (cellDimensions(cell.row(), cell.column(), with_spans)); }
00163 
00171     virtual QicsRegion currentViewport(void) const;
00172 
00186     virtual bool requestCellOverflow(const QicsRegion &cur_area,
00187                      const QRect &cur_rect,
00188                      QicsRegion &new_area,
00189                      QRect &new_rect);
00190 
00197     virtual void acceptCellOverflow(QicsRegion &area);
00198 
00203     int modelColumnIndex(int column) const;
00204 
00209     int modelRowIndex(int row) const;
00210 
00220     virtual void orderRowsBy(int column,
00221                  QicsSortOrder order = Ascending,
00222                  DataItemComparator func = 0);
00223 
00229     virtual void orderColumnsBy(int row,
00230                 QicsSortOrder order = Ascending,
00231                 DataItemComparator func = 0);
00232 
00236     void dumpPositions(void) const;
00237 
00238 protected:
00239 
00243     inline QicsDataModel *dataModel(void) const
00244     { return (myInfo.dataModel()); }
00245 
00249     inline QicsStyleManager &styleManager(void) const
00250     { return (*(myInfo.styleManager())); }
00251 
00255     inline QicsDimensionManager &dimensionManager(void) const
00256     { return (*(myInfo.dimensionManager())); }
00257 
00261     inline QicsMappedDimensionManager &mappedDM(void) const
00262     { return (*(myInfo.mappedDM())); }
00263 
00267     inline QicsSelectionManager &selectionManager(void) const
00268     { return (*(myInfo.selectionManager())); }
00269 
00270 
00276     virtual void drawRegion(const QicsRegion &region, QPainter *painter);
00277 
00283     virtual void drawGridLines(const QicsRegion &reg, QPainter *painter);
00284 
00293     virtual void drawCell(int row, int col, int x, int y,
00294               bool look_for_overflower, QPainter *painter);
00295 
00306     virtual bool prepareToDraw(int row, int col, const QRect &rect,
00307                    QPainter *painter);
00308     
00315     virtual const QicsDataItem *cellValue(int row, int col) const;
00316 
00321     QicsICell computeCellPositions(const QRect &bounds,
00322                    const QicsICell &start);
00323 
00327     QicsCellDisplay *cellDisplay(int row, int col) const;
00328 
00330 
00334     QicsGridInfo &myInfo;
00335         
00339     QicsRegion myViewport;
00340 
00341     QicsPositionList myRowPositions;
00345     QicsPositionList myColumnPositions;
00346 
00351     QicsICellQVL myAlreadyDrawnCells;
00352 
00356     QicsRegionV myOverflows;
00357 
00361     QicsMainGrid *myMainGrid;
00362 
00366     QicsCell *myCell;
00367 };
